verses.verse: לִשְׁלֹמֹ֨ה׀ <WH8010> lish-lo-Moh [A Psalm] for Solomon אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> 'elo-Him, O God מִ֭שְׁפָּטֶיךָ <WH4941> Mish-pa-tei-cha thy judgments לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> le-Me-lech the king תֵּ֑ן <WH5414> Ten; Give וְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <WH6666> ve-tzid-ka-te-Cha and thy righteousness לְבֶן־ <WH1121> le-ven- son מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> Me-lech. unto the king's

יָדִ֣ין <WH1777> ya-Din He shall judge עַמְּךָ֣ <WH5971> 'am-me-Cha thy people בְצֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> ve-Tze-dek; with righteousness וַעֲנִיֶּ֥יךָ <WH6041> va-'a-ni-Yei-cha and thy poor בְמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> ve-mish-Pat. with judgment

יִשְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> yis-'U shall bring הָרִ֓ים <WH2022> ha-Rim The mountains שָׁ֘ל֥וֹם <WH7965> sha-Lom peace לָעָ֑ם <WH5971> la-'Am; to the people וּ֝גְבָע֗וֹת <WH1389> u-ge-va-'ot, and the little hills בִּצְדָקָֽה׃ <WH6666> bitz-da-Kah. by righteousness

יִשְׁפֹּ֤ט׀ <WH8199> yish-Pot He shall judge עֲ‍ ֽנִיֵּי־ <WH6041> 'ani-yei- the poor עָ֗ם <WH5971> 'Am, of the people י֭וֹשִׁיעַ <WH3467> Yoo-shi-a' he shall save לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei the children אֶבְי֑וֹן <WH34> ev-Yon; of the needy וִֽידַכֵּ֣א <WH1792> vi-dak-Ke and shall break in pieces עוֹשֵֽׁק׃ <WH6231> o-Shek. the oppressor

יִֽירָא֥וּךָ <WH3372> yi-ra-'U-cha They shall fear עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- thee as long as שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> Sha-mesh; the sun וְלִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> ve-lif-Nei endure יָ֝רֵ֗חַ <WH3394> ya-Re-ach, and moon דּ֣וֹר <WH1755> Dor throughout all דּוֹרִֽים׃ <WH1755> do-Rim. generations

יֵ֭רֵד <WH3381> Ye-red He shall come down כְּמָטָ֣ר <WH4306> ke-ma-Tar like rain עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon גֵּ֑ז <WH1488> Gez; upon the mown כִּ֝רְבִיבִ֗ים <WH7241> kir-vi-Vim, grass as showers זַרְזִ֥יף <WH2222> zar-Zif [that] water אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> 'A-retz. the earth

יִֽפְרַח־ <WH6524> yif-rach- flourish בְּיָמָ֥יו <WH3117> be-ya-Mav In his days צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik; shall the righteous וְרֹ֥ב <WH7230> ve-Ro and abundance שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם <WH7965> Lom, of peace עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- till בְּלִ֥י <WH1097> be-Li is no יָרֵֽחַ׃ <WH3394> ya-Re-ach. so long as the moon

וְ֭יֵרְדְּ <WH7287> Ve-ye-red He shall have dominion מִיָּ֣ם <WH3220> mi-Yam also from sea עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against יָ֑ם <WH3220> Yam; to sea וּ֝מִנָּהָ֗ר <WH5104> u-min-na-Har, and from the river עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against אַפְסֵי־ <WH657> 'af-sei- unto the ends אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> 'A-retz. of the earth

לְ֭פָנָיו <WH6440> Le-fa-nav before יִכְרְע֣וּ <WH3766> yich-re-'U shall bow צִיִּ֑ים <WH6728> tzi-Yim; They that dwell in the wilderness וְ֝אֹיְבָ֗יו <WH341> ve-'o-ye-Vav, him and his enemies עָפָ֥ר <WH6083> 'a-Far the dust יְלַחֵֽכוּ׃ <WH3897> ye-la-Che-chu. shall lick

מַלְכֵ֬י <WH4428> mal-Chei The kings תַרְשִׁ֣ישׁ <WH8659> tar-Shish of Tarshish וְ֭אִיִּים <WH339> Ve-'i-yim and of the isles מִנְחָ֣ה <WH4503> min-Chah presents יָשִׁ֑יבוּ <WH7725> ya-Shi-vu; shall bring מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> mal-Chei the kings שְׁבָ֥א <WH7614> she-Va of Sheba וּ֝סְבָ֗א <WH5434> u-se-Va, and Seba אֶשְׁכָּ֥ר <WH814> 'esh-Kar gifts יַקְרִֽיבוּ׃ <WH7126> yak-Ri-vu. shall offer

וְיִשְׁתַּחֲווּ־ <WH7812> ve-yish-ta-cha-vu- shall fall down ל֥וֹ lo כָל־ <WH3605> chol all מְלָכִ֑ים <WH4428> me-la-Chim; Yea all kings כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All גּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> go-Yim before him all nations יַֽעַבְדֽוּהוּ׃ <WH5647> Ya-'av-Du-hu. shall serve

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for יַ֭צִּיל <WH5337> Yatz-tzil For he shall deliver אֶבְי֣וֹן <WH34> ev-Yon the needy מְשַׁוֵּ֑עַ <WH7768> me-shav-Ve-a'; when he crieth וְ֝עָנִ֗י <WH6041> ve-'a-Ni, the poor וְֽאֵין־ <WH369> ve-'ein- has עֹזֵ֥ר <WH5826> 'o-Zer also and [him] that hath no helper לֽוֹ׃ lo.

יָ֭חֹס <WH2347> Ya-chos He shall spare עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on דַּ֣ל <WH1800> dal the poor וְאֶבְי֑וֹן <WH34> ve-'ev-Yon; and needy וְנַפְשׁ֖וֹת <WH5315> ve-naf-Shot the souls אֶבְיוֹנִ֣ים <WH34> ev-yo-Nim of the needy יוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH3467> yo-Shi-a'. and shall save

מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8496> mit-Toch from deceit וּ֭מֵחָמָס <WH2555> U-me-cha-mos and violence יִגְאַ֣ל <WH1350> yig-'Al He shall redeem נַפְשָׁ֑ם <WH5315> naf-Sham; their soul וְיֵיקַ֖ר <WH3365> ve-yei-Kar and precious דָּמָ֣ם <WH1818> da-Mam shall their blood בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> be-'ei-Nav. be in his sight

וִיחִ֗י <WH2421> vi-Chi, And he shall live וְיִתֶּן־ <WH5414> ve-yit-ten- and to him shall be given לוֹ֮ lo מִזְּהַ֪ב <WH2091> miz-ze-Hav of the gold שְׁ֫בָ֥א <WH7614> she-Va of Sheba וְיִתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <WH6419> ve-yit-pal-Lel prayer also shall be made בַּעֲד֣וֹ <WH1157> ba-'a-Do about תָמִ֑יד <WH8548> ta-Mid; for him continually כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom, [and] daily יְבָרֲכֶֽנְהֽוּ׃ <WH1288> ye-va-ra-Chen-Hu. shall he be praised

יְהִ֤י <WH1961> ye-Hi become פִסַּת־ <WH6451> fis-sat- There shall be an handful בַּ֨ר׀ <WH1250> bar of corn בָּאָרֶץ֮ <WH776> ba-'a-Retz in the earth בְּרֹ֪אשׁ <WH7218> be-Rosh upon the top הָ֫רִ֥ים <WH2022> ha-Rim of the mountains יִרְעַ֣שׁ <WH7493> yir-'Ash thereof shall shake כַּלְּבָנ֣וֹן <WH3844> kal-le-va-Non like Lebanon פִּרְי֑וֹ <WH6529> pir-Yo; the fruit וְיָצִ֥יצוּ <WH6692> ve-ya-Tzi-tzu shall flourish מֵ֝עִ֗יר <WH5892> me-'Ir, and [they] of the city כְּעֵ֣שֶׂב <WH6212> ke-'E-sev like grass הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. of the earth

יְהִ֤י <WH1961> ye-Hi endure שְׁמ֨וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo His name לְֽעוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam, shall endure for ever לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> lif-nei- as long as שֶׁמֶשׁ֮ <WH8121> she-Mesh the sun; יָנִין ya-nin כיִנֹּ֪ון <WH5125> yin-Non be continued קשְׁ֫מ֥וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo his name וְיִתְבָּ֥רְכוּ <WH1288> ve-yit-Ba-re-chu and [men] shall be blessed ב֑וֹ vo; כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all גּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> go-Yim in him all nations יְאַשְּׁרֽוּהוּ׃ <WH833> ye-'ash-she-Ru-hu. shall call him blessed

בָּר֤וּךְ׀ <WH1288> ba-Ruch Blessed יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [be] the LORD אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him God אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel עֹשֵׂ֖ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh who only doeth נִפְלָא֣וֹת <WH6381> nif-la-'ot wondrous things לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <WH905> le-vad-Do. alone

וּבָר֤וּךְ׀ <WH1288> u-va-Ruch And blessed שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> shem name כְּבוֹד֗וֹ <WH3519> ke-vo-Do, [be] his glorious לְע֫וֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam for ever וְיִמָּלֵ֣א <WH4390> ve-yim-ma-Le be filled כְ֭בוֹדוֹ <WH3519> che-vo-do [with] his glory אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כֹּ֥ל <WH3605> kol and may the whole הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, and let the whole earth אָ֘מֵ֥ן׀ <WH543> 'a-Men Amen וְאָמֵֽן׃ <WH543> ve-'a-Men. and Amen
כָּלּ֥וּ <WH3615> kal-Lu are ended תְפִלּ֑וֹת <WH8605> te-fil-Lot; The prayers דָּ֝וִ֗ד <WH1732> da-Vid, of David בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יִשָֽׁי׃ <WH3448> yi-Shai. of Jesse
